question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
For each of the following statements please indicate how much each of the following statements reflects how you typically are.
I am good at resisting temptation.
I have a hard time breaking bad habits.
I do certain things that are bad for me, if they are fun.
I refuse things that are bad for me.
I wish I had more self-discipline.
People would say that I have iron self-discipline.
Pleasure and fun sometimes keep me from getting work done.
I am able to work effectively toward long-term goals.
Sometimes I canâ€™t stop myself from doing something, even if I know it is wrong.
I often act without thinking through all the alternatives.
Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
